item.title: Hosting With Hugo
item.author: blog@lordyod.com (Lord Yod)
item.description: This blog is built using Hugo, a framework for building static websites. In this post I’ll walk through how I’ve set up a private Github repo with continous deployment to a public site hosted with Github Pages to host my blog.
